name: Google Gemini Tool
semantic_context: Interact with Google Gemini AI models
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Gemini Tool 节点。主要用于: Interact with Google Gemini AI models

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Interact with Google Gemini AI models
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Interact with Google Gemini AI models | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: text

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: generate
available_options: Analyze Video (值: analyze) - Take in videos and answer questions about them
Generate a Video (值: generate) - Creates a video from a text prompt
Download Video (值: download) - Download a generated video from the Google Gemini API using a URL

modelId.name: modelId
modelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text Input | 默认值: What's in this video?

inputType.name: inputType
inputType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Type | 默认值: url

audioUrls.name: audioUrls
audioUrls.description: URL(s) of the audio(s) to transcribe, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
audioUrls.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL(s) | 作用: URL(s) of the audio(s) to transcribe, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary field(s) which contains the video(s), seperate multiple field names with commas
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name(s) | 作用: Name of the binary field(s) which contains the video(s), seperate multiple field names with commas | 提示: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be processed | 默认值: data

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: Whether to simplify the response or not
simplify.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify Output | 作用: Whether to simplify the response or not | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: sampleCount (值: None) - How many videos to generate
durationSeconds (值: None) - Length of the generated video in seconds. Supported only by certain models.

documentUrls.name: documentUrls
documentUrls.description: URL(s) of the document(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
documentUrls.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL(s) | 作用: URL(s) of the document(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma

fileUrl.name: fileUrl
fileUrl.description: URL of the file to upload
fileUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: URL of the file to upload

imageUrls.name: imageUrls
imageUrls.description: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
imageUrls.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL(s) | 作用: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.description: A text description of the desired video
prompt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Prompt | 作用: A text description of the desired video

images.name: images
images.description: Add one or more binary fields to include images with your prompt
images.natural_language_description: 参数名: Images | 作用: Add one or more binary fields to include images with your prompt | 默认值: {'values': [{'binaryPropertyName': 'data'}]}

messages.name: messages
messages.natural_language_description: 参数名: Messages | 默认值: {'values': [{'content': ''}]}

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput
jsonOutput.description: Whether to attempt to return the response in JSON format
jsonOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output Content as JSON | 作用: Whether to attempt to return the response in JSON format | 默认值: False

videoUrls.name: videoUrls
videoUrls.description: URL(s) of the video(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
videoUrls.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL(s) | 作用: URL(s) of the video(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma

url.name: url
url.description: The URL from Google Gemini API to download the video from
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: The URL from Google Gemini API to download the video from

returnAs.name: returnAs
returnAs.description: Whether to return the video as a binary file or a URL that can be used to download the video later
returnAs.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return As | 作用: Whether to return the video as a binary file or a URL that can be used to download the video later | 默认值: video
